mapper.select: SELECT TM_EMAIL, TM_PW FROM TEST_MEMBER WHERE TM_NUM = #{tm_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST_MEMBER(TM_NUM, TM_NAME, TM_EMAIL, TM_PW, TM_ZIPCODE, TM_ADDR, TM_EXTRAADDR, TM_BIRTH, TM_LEVEL, TM_INSERTDATE, TM_UPDATEDATE, TM_DELETEYN) VALUES(#{tm_num}, #{tm_name}, #{tm_email}, #{tm_pw}, #{tm_zipcode}, #{tm_addr}, #{tm_extraAddr}, #{tm_birth}, 'N', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y')
